messages.content: Great call ben thanks for the tips.
are you joining the quick call please ben?
yopu

heres the debug log

newbug for you to look at i think . When generating the re-write. it seems to create extra files if you select new instead of replace. here is a loom
Thanks.  I usually get a replacement text in the article space saying the length is too many tokens when that happens.

sorry for the late reply.

it's a best guess but it looks like this file is especially big.

it probably exceeds the openai context size (which we use under the hood).

i have an idea on how to fix it.

will do it tomorrow

I am getting error : failed to fetch. For
Folders.  Can you advise please

<@747696622489829396> should be fixed when you update your instance on github. You need to go to actions and click on run workflow. can you let me know if that works?

yes it would be the same for render. the ui will just look a bit different

<@969120668136394753> answering to your DM
If you use mac you can open obsidian console option+cmd+i
were would i look for that please?

I had same problem, and I think I have seen someone else also mentioning this issue. But my Fo2k still works after enabling selfhosting and providing host address
i seem t have a similair problem to sailesh

hey all - please help. I am at the end of my tech abilities but love the product offereing. Have puchases a lifetie licence.  I have set up a giithub on Vercel, and copied the API across. I used a solo API key generated on the setup page and an OPEN API key . Now when i press actvate in the plug in i get invaliude licence please try again. I THINK the porblem might be that i copied the orginal greate key, but didnt copy it into the plugin. Now if i generate a new license key it says invalid. Help please. I probably need to find the orginal licence key in the github repositiry but i dont know how
Sending you a DM to help troubleshoot
Yes

Hi moving my query here. Seems to be licence invalid with or without that self-host box ticked. I have Lifetime Access Setup; vercel.app url pasted. I have created a new vault, same issue. Does this licence only work with 1 vault at a time or something?
<@747696622489829396> is your plugin + your instance up to date?

Atomic notes still seem to be an issue for me! Seems like something is happening when I hit the button but no log entries in FO2k logs folder and no new notes anywhere I can find with the parsed data.
So if you‚Äôd want to spare those $7 you can set up vercel instead now
Ahh okay. We just released the fix
deployed to Render instead, got it working there
<@372021870909849610> I think we identified where the issue is coming from. Also releasing a fix in a bit. Did you manage to deploy at all?
invalid max duration
signed up for lifetime today, got a deployment error on Vercel

A couple of nitpicks and perhaps QOL request.  For tags, can we get a button that writes all of the tags to the note?  clicking individual tags is a bit tedious.  also, noticed that most of the title suggestions include ":" which are not allowed in obsidian titles: "Title: Subtitle"...thanks.
<@701785424921886750> thanks - can you DM please with instructions on how to auto update my instance? I'd love to update to the latest version without losing the ability to transcript videos
it's not possible right now but it's in the roadmap üôè agree it makes more sense that way
hey <@1058697941356916807> did you setup automatic updates for your instance? if not I will DM you with instructions on how to do it

I have been able to downgrade to version 1.47.10 and transcripts work well in that version. They don't work at all in the latest version (I made tons of attempts, rebooting etc) - works almost flawlessly in 1.47.10

Oh no, I just updated the plugin for the first time, and since I did I cannot get any video transcript... I always get an error that it cannot retrieve the transcript.

I was using it just before updating and got 3 transcripts without error... but all my attempts after the update are failing - I tried with the share yt url, I quit/reloaded obsidian, without success.

Is there any way I can roll back to a previous version?

Is there a way to put those buttons below the AI responses?

Sometimes the responses are very long, especially when requesting transcripts. And we have to scroll up a lot after the answer is complete to access them.
Awesome üôå
Working again, thank you very much for your prompt assistance!
It's a tough life on Windows üòÖ but yeah sorry to hear that sucks
in Settings > Environment Variables
great thank you!
this is where you can find your Fo2k License key
Everything with FO2k was working great but now I'm starting from scratch locally
ahh so nothing works right now?
Let me clarify - you helped me the other day and it was working great! My computer crashed and I had to reinstall my Operating System!

I haven't been able to reproduce this issue so far so I'm not sure how to resolve it just yet. I thought it was due to outdated instances. But I believe you have the latest one so there must be another issue

<@701785424921886750> I have run into that issue too, and would like to know how to resolve.... Additionally, I had a catastrophic computer error yesterday and lost my setup - can you include information on how to retrieve my key from my vercel deployment, or should I generate a new one?
hi <@1289537697861472338> sending you the intstructions via dm

I seem to have the same issue with Fabric 500
thank you!
Hi <@747696622489829396> Sending you a DM

I could really use some help.  I'm making things worse the more I touch this. I have a lifetime license. I need to start over with the deployment but when I try now it's failing deployment with an error. How can I start from scratch?
got it. I think I know what the issue is. you'd see that error if your vercel instance is not up to date. I'll provide you with instructions on how to do that via DM
Yes. Any pattern. Two different computers, differnt notes that I tried it on
are you getting the error for any pattern you try to apply?
just tested with the latest version of the plugin and seems to be working as expected
<@669354076739207209> No you are the first to report this issue. Will look into it
Have you had anyone else get an error 500 when they click apply on fabric?
thx
will add to the list üôè
Is any chance in next scope u can plan ad implementig 1. folder custom field for Fabric(for now we must use _FileOrganize2000) 2. fix this dropdown make fixed size and scrollable. ?

<@793773558261874718> should be fixed in v1.47.4 
Could you update the plugin and try again?
Fantastic! Just tried the automatic formatting via inbox - that works like a charm üôÇ  Thanks!
we'll get this fixed today
ok there seems to be a bug. I'm getting errors as well
That I haven‚Äôt tried yet
ok looking into it now. and what happens when you process it via the inbox? with the auto-formatting feature enabled
Via the sidebar - both when the note is recognized by the content and when template is selected manually from the dropdown
got it. and you get this error when attempting to apply a template via the assistant sidebar? or when processed via the inbox?
Three day trial so far
what's your setup? free? monthly? lifetime?
Yes - everything seems to work - except the templates function‚Ä¶
Good morning! Do the other functionalities work? the ai chat and the sidebar?
It will work out of the box for lifetime users

Morning! Fantastic plugin so far, but I am having issues with the template function. No matter how simple I make the template, it results in the message ‚ÄúAn error occurred while formatting the content‚Äù. I admit this is a quite vague error description, but do you have any clues as to what might be going on?
So, audio transcription wont work out of hte box for lifetime accounts as well? that is a bummer
with the monthly subscription credits are included and it doesn't require an openAI key
with the lifetime subscription users need to provide their own openAI API key + credits
how does this work with the lifetime sub? Or will this plugin work only with the subscription?
yikes ok thanks
and if you want to setup your own server with deepgram you can see the current implementation. that's also in the github repo
nope sorry we don‚Äôt have a guide for that. But you could check older versions of the codebase to see how it was implemented with openAI. I think we made the change around mid July
is there a guide orhow to?
Yes this is what I mean. Audio transcription is only accessible out of to box with paid plans. With the free plan you'll need to make some adjustments to the code
How about voice recording/ transcription?

hi <@508134668751732746> yes that would be expected. Audio transcription is currently only accessible to paid users since there are costs associated with running the server. It used to be with openAI but we introduced a more powerful system a couple of months ago (Deepgram). You could either setup your own server or modify the code to use openAI.

hi there this plugin looks like the ideal workflow i've been trying to cobble together for a while, thanks for this. I installed the plugin and set it up to run locally, and i see the following error when i move an audio file to the folder
the local server address is unchanged (localhost:3000) in the plugin
<@701191354201538590> I'd recommend moving the jpeg file to the inbox folder for that. It will process the image and extract the text. Just make sure the image is not embedded in a text note
There is better work flow to do this?
What's the context size?  I'm trying to extract text from a jpeg file. I lower the file size to 943 Kb  and I'm still getting the same error.
hi <@812448938397007923> you have a lifetime plan, right? If yes I can DM you with instructions on how to make this easier

Morning!  I've been struggling to get it to self-build locally the last few updates.  I figured it would go away, but no luck so reaching out.  Attached is a screenshot of the error.

I've tried to use Cursor to make recommended changes and fix the error, but it takes me down a long and winding rabbit hole.  

To debug I've also tried to reset via:

git pull origin master 
git reset --hard origin/master

But no luck.  Thanks ahead of time for the help.
Hi just sent you a DM regarding a problem yesterday can you help please üëç
But great! üôå  thanks a lot for supporting the product. Feel free to reach out anytime for some feedback or feature requests

but I've had it in mind for a little while to add this as well. is it a bit of a technical hassle to manage but will discuss it to see what we can do. happened to me a few times as well that I lost a chat I wanted to get back to.
ok noted, not a big deal - can just pull what's needed from the current chat before creating a new one - great plugin, I love it so far
right now no. It's one chat only. And the previous one is deleted each time
thanks - apart from that, when we create a new chat, can we get back to a previous one?
but glad to hear you could get what you needed
thanks for the feedback. that's good to know. will attempt a fix to prevent these confusions later this week
yes - it looks like it sometimes fails to scrape the transcript, but creating new chats and trying again allows to get it, eventually.
hmm interesting. so did you eventually manage to extract the information you were looking for?
previously when it told me it could not get the transcript, nothing was added to the context - this time I noticed it added the video title in the context, that's why I asked for the summary
yeah, so this time I got the opposite - it told me it could not get the transcript, but it was still able to summarize it üôÇ
you can start a new chat by pressing the + icon at the top left corner
can you try with a brand new chat? it might have gotten confused if you still had the previous ask in memory
oh this strange actually... it told me it had the transcript but then it said this
thanks a lot, yes it works fine with the share link
but it worked with the share link

I tried copying the share link of the video and it was working for me

in the meantime

Does this do the same as fabric?
So i will be happy pay for plugins and extra one for control and usage my provider for ai maybe is good idea to add this functionality
it's not possible to see your usage as of now. And it really varies, it's not really about the number of documents but more about the size of documents, and what actions you perform.

ok let me know how is it count ? I mine raw how many documents or page u think will be reach limit ? also maybe will be good idea allow to add own keys from OpenApi? if that u use on the background or other provider
should be working again
<@654396093110550528> ahh yeah I see you reached your monthly credits limit. But no worries, just extended it
hi I notice after update I was able to do one reqest and after that its comming that problem

<@704738003863470110> you can find the instructions for self-hosting on the readme in github. the updated docs I was referring to concerns users with lifetime access. dm me if you need more info
